summary:
It’s the Scanman!!! I know he plays a horn thing but a recorder is just perfect for my fav Burt Reynolds.  
Also Freckles can’t...
body:
It’s the Scanman!!! I know he plays a horn thing but a recorder is just perfect for my fav Burt Reynolds.

Also Freckles can’t forget the freckles!!

So here’s my first vox machina character!!

I love and adore this small little man.

title: Various Mirrors and Wonderful Things - Strigimorphaes - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Critical Role (Web Series)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Caduceus Clay/Caleb Widogast, Mollymauk Tealeaf/Caleb Widogast, Caduceus Clay & Caleb Widogast
Characters: Caduceus Clay, Caleb Widogast
Additional Tags: past!widomauk, molly is dead, Spoilers, Ace Caduceus, Camping, Shopping, Coping with Death, Ambiguous Relationships, Self-Reflection, Not Actually Unrequited Love, clayleb - Freeform
Summary:

Caleb likes people that are odd and other.
While the Mighty Nein are on the road, he discovers that he really likes Caduceus in particular - cue more haunting memories, old feelings for Mollymauk, and a walk into the darkest woods.

blog.name: princessamericachavez
blog.title: Your Ticket to the Multiverse
blog.description: Mexican 24. Journalist, writer, geek. Currently majoring in creative writing. She/Her.

summary: Not sure if you're taking asks, but doesn't it kind of feel like Fjord and Jester have kind of grown apart in recent episodes?...
question: Not sure if you're taking asks, but doesn't it kind of feel like Fjord and Jester have kind of grown apart in recent episodes? Like, it just doesn't feel like they've had many or even any good interactions in a while, just wanted to get an opinion from the resident Fjorester Guru.
answer:
I understand the feeling, and I think we’ve all been sharing it, but I don’t think it’s so much that they’ve been drifting apart, I feel like it’s just a matter of the current circumstances. 

Like, we got pretty consistent growth from them pre Iron Shepherds, then Post-Shepherds and through the whole pirate arc there was a lot of content, especially because the story revolved around Fjord and Jester is very close to him and a very important part both of their journies is how supportive of each other they are. 

Now that they are back inland though, they’ve been pretty much in crisis-mode for weeks. From the second Nott’s backstory came forward, the M9 have been rushing to fix a situation much bigger than themselves. 

Both of them have been focusing on other stuff. Fjord is still reeling from his own arc and the consequences of strengthening Uk’otoa and what might mean for him in the future. Meanwhile, Jester hasn’t been given the chance to properly process her negative emotions and confusing feelings because, as soon as Nott needed them, she went into supportive mode again to help her detective friend.

That’s not to say they’ve stopped caring about each other’s well being the most. We’ve seen Fjord check in with her to make sure she’s ok and comfortable and Jester be extra supportive of his orcish blood and heritage, bringing up his tusks and reassuring him about his size, etc. It’s just the little things, you know? That’s what this has been built on from the start. Not the grand romantic gestures or the awkward over the top flirting. It’s the quiet support and care they share that makes them so wonderful together.

Now, in narrative terms, think of them in terms of Perc’ahlia. 

SPOILERS AHEAD IF YOU HAVEN’T WATCHED C1

The Whitestone arc being Percy-centric meant we got amazing moments like Vex being super vocal about their support or “Darling, take the mask off”, etc. Later on, though, as the Chroma Conclave arc came to a head, they went into crisis-fixing mode (much like the M9 are right now) which meant most romantic development took a backburner seat aside from cute little moments (like the ones we are getting right now). That is, of course, until we hit the Feywild and more of Vex’s backstory and personal arc came forward. Followed by Percy-centric angst with Ripley’s resurgence, his death, and rez ritual. After which it still took some time for those two to get together.

Now, I’m not saying Fjorester is going to be a carbon copy of Perc’ahlia. They are each their own wonderful flavor of ship. BUT going by that, I would argue that we’ll likely see a big return of their bigger moments as soon as Jester’s backstory comes up —because Fjord will without a shadow of a doubt be just as supportive of her as she was and it’ll probably bring out even more of the protectiveness and care we’ve seen Travis plant the seeds of this past few weeks— or when Uk’otoa decides to cash in on Fjord’s deal and pushes them back to face the darkness lurking in his dreams. 

Tl;dr: it might seem like we’re in a bit of a dry spell right now, but I’m convinced it’s just a product of the current storyline and that we still have a lot of goodness to come. Don’t despair!

summary:
Vex: You don't think I can fight because I'm a girl.
Vax: I don't think you can fight because you're in a wedding dress. For...
body:
Vex: You don’t think I can fight because I’m a girl.

Vax: I don’t think you can fight because you’re in a wedding dress. For what it’s worth, I don’t think Grog can fight in that dress either.

Grog: Perhaps not. But I would make a radiant bride.

My  art instagram is @ holloway359 and I post lots more stuff there!  Check it out if you have a chance!
